title: In-Car Navigation Map Update Inquiry
description: A customer is asking how to update the maps in their car's built-in navigation system.

tasks.description: Identify the vehicle's model year and infotainment system version.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a 2020 model with the SYNC 3 system.

tasks.description: Determine if the update is delivered via OTA or requires a manual download to a USB drive.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent's search reveals this system requires a manual USB update.

tasks.description: Guide the customer to the official website where they can download the map update, and explain the process of loading it onto a USB and installing it in the car.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a link to the download portal and clear instructions.
